title: The Talisman
description: When Ailis O'Brien's family is murdered in the Highlands, she vows to find the murderer and repay the blood debt. Though not of his clan, Laird Gavin MacPherson vows to aid her. Will their growing love fill the emptiness in their hearts or will a talisman shatter it forcing them to choose between love and vengeance?
author: Deborah Gafford
